text:
Hi Team, hope your week-end went well!

I faced a problem implementing the HubSpot API.

The goal is to update some field on my companies, I want to use the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/imports?_ga=2.199278446.1753207875.1595838474-1533911020.1595601878|bulk import> but it seems like I can't update companies like that.
Calling companies by domain or name create new ones and calling them by their ids just don't work, using hs_object_id : (FAILED_VALIDATION,COMPANY,"Property value 'XXXXXX' isn't valid (from column 'ID')").

I know I can use previous version API to get and update companies one by one but it's a scheduled task (CRON) and I need to optimize the number of requests.
Is there any way to use bulk import for this specific case ?
Please let me now and have a nice day :slightly_smiling_face:
is there anyone with experience of using an API with GotoWebinar and HubSpot? Currently there is a integration for it, however, it lacks a lot of the data we are needing.
